rooms.description: Open concept living area with Bohemian decor elements, natural light and plant integration.
Cozy dining space adjacent to the kitchen, featuring natural materials and ambient lighting.
Spacious modern kitchen designed for functionality with a nod to Bohemian style using reclaimed wood finishes and artistic fixtures.
Relaxation area that doubles as a guest lounge, incorporating soft textures and colorful accents in keeping with the Bohemian theme.
Dedicated home office space designed for productivity with ample natural light, ergonomic furniture and soundproofing features.
Primary bathroom on the ground floor featuring water-efficient fixtures and modern Bohemian design elements such as mosaic tiles.

openings.description: Large windows for natural lighting, ensuring Vastu-compliant directional placement.
Windows with adjustable shutters to control light and heat.
Soundproof door for privacy and reduced noise interference.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony, Bohemian-inspired decor, Vastu-compliant room orientation ensuring positive energy flow.
Additional bedroom designed for guest or children; features comfortable and creative design elements that incorporate natural materials and local art.
Second additional bedroom with a focus on relaxation and minimalistic Bohemian style.
Third additional bedroom integrating soft, earthy colors and sustainable design for peaceful rest.
Secondary bathroom located near the bedrooms, ensuring easy access with modern fixtures and artistic touches in line with Bohemian aesthetics.

openings.description: Sturdy staircase connecting the floors, designed in a rustic style that blends with the overall theme.
Private balcony with natural views and space for plants, aligned to Vastu principles.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom on the second floor that offers a unique perspective and ample light, decorated in a Bohemian style.
Cozy study area integrated with the bedroom, designed for quiet work or reading, featuring built-in shelves and ambient lighting.

openings.description: Secondary staircase providing access between floors while maintaining structural integrity and design cohesion.

vastu_considerations: The design incorporates Vastu principles by ensuring that the main entrance faces an auspicious direction, rooms are oriented to promote positive energy flow, and natural light is maximized in living spaces. The separation of noise-intensive areas from relaxation zones has been maintained throughout.
building_norms: This villa design complies with local building norms for residential properties on a 40x60 feet plot in India, ensuring safety standards, structural integrity, and adherence to zoning laws.
